about.title: About Us
about.mission_content: We are dedicated to helping everyone discover their true self, becoming your pocket energy station.
about.product_content: Based on deep energy analysis, our app decodes your life's underlying patterns, helping you resolve all emotional challenges.
about.feature_2_desc: Overcome procrastination, anxiety, self-doubt, and insecurity
about.contact_content: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to reach out:
about.thanks: Thank you for choosing our product!

delete_account.title: Delete Account
